title: Invoice Shipping Line for Services
description: A vessel has departed. The finance department must generate an invoice for all services rendered.

tasks.description: Retrieve all billable activities for the vessel's port call (e.g., stevedoring moves, wharfage, pilotage fees).
tasks.expected_outcome: Finance clerk compiles a list of all charges from the TOS and port authority records.

tasks.description: Apply the correct rates from the shipping line's contract or the port tariff.
tasks.expected_outcome: The correct price is applied to each service line item.

tasks.description: Generate and send a formal invoice to the shipping line's accounting department.
tasks.expected_outcome: A detailed invoice is created and emailed to the customer.
